episodes.title: How Sandie Peggie took on the trans cult
episodes.description:
Ella Whelan, Tom Slater and Fraser Myers on the battle for women’s spaces.

This is a clip from the latest episode of the spiked podcast. Watch the full thing here: anva.com/design/DAGc8PXodxo/OsNYk949n-6HQcEDNcMQww/edit

*About spiked:*

Founded in 2000, _spiked_ was a pioneer of 21st-century journalism – the first online-only political magazine in the UK. 

Now edited by Tom Slater, _spiked_ reaches millions around the world with hard-hitting articles, incisive essays and a growing roster of podcasts and videos.

The _spiked_ story so far: https://youtu.be/JwulwsiwmKo?si=bZbvKE269MxTk3KE 

*Support spiked:*

We would not exist without the support of our audience. Our donation-funded model means we have no corporate ties or interests to appease.

Become a supporter: https://www.spiked-online.com/support/
